---
name: create-instructions
description: instruction-generator
agent: instruction-generator
---

take the information below and generate a detailed agent instruction file in markdown format for the /docs directory. if a .md file already exists for the specified agent, update it with any new information provided. ensure the file includes appropriate attributes in the YAML front matter and a clear, structured set of instructions for the agent to follow.Make sure to update AGENTS.md as well to refence the new or updated instruction file.If no information is provided about the layer of architecture or specific feature, create a generic instruction file that outlines best practices for creating agent instruction files.
